reviews.review_msg: the only thing that he cares about is APA.and if you are a foundation student or you are in your first semester don't take any class with him. number of good votes surprised me because he failed 3 out of 5 of my team members
He's a kind person but not a good marker.
Should be nice to student, don't that much strictness need students.

the professor is very kind
always understand the situation and always try to give the best
he take no exam only projects are given
Toughest professor not recommend at all

The professor is good; however, he is strict in his grading. He is unclear with his grading criteria and gives grades to what seems appealing to him or what pleases the eye. It is a highly project-based course. Do not expect high marks even if you do really well. If you want to learn something or score high marks, he is not the teacher.

Ilia is an amazing instructor, so helpful and understanding. This class requires lots of work and class participation. You can really improve your writing and presentation skills. The group project is the main assignment you will have, and it is extremely cool but also hard, so choose your teammates wisely. Overall amazing and extremely useful

Had him for 501 in UCW. Great professor, very engaging classes. Lot of workload, but you get to learn many things in return. Put in an effort, and he will give you good grades. Approachable, and he'll clear all your doubts. If you want to study, properly, highly recommend him. If you just want to pass with minimal work, look for other options.

He starts class with a question about what is happening in the business world and students comment that goes on almost all the class time Group you are4 the project is what gives him ur attendance and participation,so he can grade u Choose your group wisely He is very demanding,tough grader but gives good feedbacks on how to adjust the assignments

Young but disciplined. Listen to his instructions and you will excel. flaunt his rules to your detriment. Participation and attendance in class and group meetings. straight-to-the-point answers. Finally, be polite and respectful.
Take his classes for building a great foundation for your whole MBA.

CHOOSE ONLY IF YOU ARE HERE TO LEARN.
You will see yourself gaining so much knowledge when you listen and follow what he says in each and every class.
Nothing comes easy, and Ilia is the personification of that message.
He pushes your learning curve high by pushing you to learn by being self dependent but with clear guidelines, excellent mentoring and feedback.

Mr. Ilia Bykov is a wonderful mentor and his way of teaching is really interesting. He is very fair with everyone in assigning the grades. The thing I like the most about him was that he was always accessible 24/7 outside class to answer any query. For me, he is one of the best teachers I have come across till now.
